description: It's been a dream of mine to work with Peter Stallion one day. I've been following his porn career for years and he always made me so horny. When my producer in Europe told me that Peter would be interested in a photo shoot, I jumped at this opportunity and offered him to be featured on Maskurbate with a mask on. This guy is so natural, so at ease, that I almost had no editing to do. Judging by his hardon, I guess we can say that all of us had a great time!
title: Peter Stallion, Scene #01
